# Colophon {.unlisted .unnumbered}

Composed in ET Book, a free and open-sopurce typeface designed by Dmitry Krasny, Bonnie Scranton, and Edward Tufte; and \TeX  Gyre Heros, a fontbased on the URW Nimbus Sans L kindly released by URW++ Design and Development Inc. under GFL. Based on [Tufte-Latex](https://tufte-latex.github.io/tufte-latex/) and [Quarto](https://quarto.org).
